quote: A different language is a different vision of life.
author: Federico Fellini

quote: The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: He who knows no foreign languages knows nothing of his own.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: To have another language is to possess a second soul.
author: Charlemagne

quote: Knowledge of languages is the doorway to wisdom.
author: Roger Bacon

quote: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Do you know what a foreign accent is? It’s a sign of bravery.
author: Amy Chua

quote: Learn a language, and you’ll avoid a war
author: Arab Proverb
